channel.title: GitHub Svelte Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Svelte in GitHub

item.title: pluja/whishper
item.description: Transcribe any audio to text, translate and edit subtitles 100% locally with a web UI. Powered by whisper models!

item.title: mathesar-foundation/mathesar
item.description: An intuitive spreadsheet-like interface that lets users of all technical skill levels view, edit, query, and collaborate on Postgres data directly‚Äî100% open source and self hosted, with native Postgres access control.

item.description: FreeShow is a free and open-source, user-friendly presenter software.

item.title: matt8707/ha-fusion
item.description: A modern, easy-to-use and performant custom Home Assistant dashboard

item.title: dbgate/dbgate
item.description: Database manager for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, SQLite and others. Runs under Windows, Linux, Mac or as web application

item.description: best way to save what you love
